item.title: Welcome to Heerise
item.description: Welcome to Heerise! We are excited to launch our career coaching platform. Stay tuned for more updates on how we can help you achieve your career goals.

item.title: 5 Tips for Career Growth in 2026
item.description: Looking to accelerate your career in 2026? Here are five actionable tips to help you grow professionally.
